vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway2.redeem (patch_15.sol#14-19) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_15.sol#16)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_15.sol#17)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_15.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_15.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in WhaleGiveaway2.command (patch_15.sol#26-29):
	-require(bool)(adr.call.value(msg.value)(data)) patch_15.sol#28
